test-property.name: Test property
test-property.desc: A test number property. Displayed by 'Alert' action.

isCanMatch.description: Call when the player can match any game.

conCanNotMatchAsync.display-text: Player can not match any game.
conCanNotMatchAsync.description: Call when the player can not match any game.

init.display-text: Connect Plugin with Facebook Instant Games Plugin
init.description: Connect the Plugin with the official Facebook Instant Games Plugin.

getSupportedApis.description: Provides a list of API functions that are supported by the client.

match-async-player.display-text: Match Player Async to [i]{0}[/i] and switch context [i]{1}[/i]
match-async-player.description: Attempts to match the current player with other users looking for people to play with.

matchtag.name: MatchTag
matchtag.desc: Optional extra information about the player used to group them with similar players.

switchcontext.name: SwitchContext
switchcontext.desc: Optional extra parameter that specifies whether the player should be immediately switched to the new context when a match is found.

checkCanMatchAsync.description: Checks if the current player is eligible for the matchPlayerAsync API.
